Key Match Events: The White Sox scored five runs in the top of the ninth to win the game, 7-2.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Richard Fitts made his Major League debut for the Red Sox and pitched 5 2/3 innings, allowing six hits, two unearned runs, and striking out two.
Others: The Red Sox were 0-for-6 with runners in scoring position.
The White Sox's rally in the ninth inning was aided by a costly fielding error by Triston Casas.
